---
name: Model Request
about: Request support for a new model
title: "[MODEL] "
labels: enhancement, model-request
assignees: ''
---

## Model Information
- **Name**: [e.g., FLUX.1-dev]
- **HuggingFace URL**: [e.g., https://huggingface.co/black-forest-labs/FLUX.1-dev]
- **Task**: [e.g., text-to-image, text-to-speech, etc.]

## Why Add This Model?
Explain why this model would be valuable:
- Better quality than existing options?
- Faster inference?
- Unique capabilities?
- Popular/well-maintained?

## Model Size
Approximate download size (check the HuggingFace model page).

## License
What license is the model released under? (MIT, Apache 2.0, etc.)

## Additional Notes
Any special requirements, dependencies, or considerations.
